name: Outlandish Showdown
description:
GIVE ME HEALTH OR GIVE ME BAR

In the outland there are many grudges but only so many bullets.

Play against an AI or another player.

Player1: 
Move: WASD
Shoot: G
Dash: Left-Shift

Player2: 
Move: Arrows
Shoot: Right-Ctrl
Dash: Right-Shift

HOLD ESCAPE TO END ROUND AND GO BACK TO OPPONENT SELECTION MENU

shoutout to: https://www.reddit.com/r/PixelArt/comments/4s1mh5/newbie_pixel_art_background_pr.. for the pixel art background!
